item.title: Dynamics inference
item.description: 6.2.2.1 slingshot 6.2.2.2 CellRank 6.2.2.3 CytoTree 6.2.2.4 VeloViz 6.2.2.5 Asc-Seurat 6.2.2.6 VeTra 6.2.2.7 TIMEOR 6.2.2.8 UniTVelo 6.2.2.9 TIPS 6.2.2.10 Velo-Predictor 6.2.2.11 ORIGINS 6.2.2.12 PAGA 6.2.2.13 SCORPIUS 6.2.2.14 STEMNET 6.2.2.15 Monocle3 6.2.2.16 scVelo 6.2.2.17 veloVI Trajectory inference aims at estimating dynamic changes in a single-cell transcriptome landscape, assuming that the cell-wise transcriptome is a static snapshot at a time point along some cellular process. The pseudotime and RNA velocity both are considered as the trajectory inference.

item.title: Cell-cell communication
item.description: 6.2.3.1 IUPHAR 6.2.3.2 CellPhoneDB 6.2.3.3 FANTOM5 6.2.3.4 Cell-Cell Interaction Database 6.2.3.5 ligand-receptor pairs in literature 6.2.3.6 DLRP 6.2.3.7 ConnectomeDB 6.2.3.8 CellTalkDB 6.2.3.9 ICELLNET 6.2.3.10 Cellinker 6.2.3.11 PlantPhoneDB 6.2.3.12 CellCallEXT 6.2.3.13 CellChat 6.2.3.14 Giotto 6.2.3.15 SingleCellSignalR 6.2.3.16 CellCall 6.2.3.17 TraSig 6.2.3.18 celltalker 6.2.3.19 iTALK 6.2.3.20 PyMINEr 6.2.3.21 DeepCCI 6.2.3.22 NicheNet 6.2.3.23 SpaOTsc 6.2.3.24 CCCExplorer 6.2.3.25 SoptSC 6.2.3.26 NATMI 6.2.3.27 scConnect 6.2.3.28 FunRes 6.2.3.29 scTensor Cell communication across multiple cell types and tissues strictly mediates proper functioning of metazoans and extensively relies on interactions between secreted ligands and cell-surface receptors.
